review: I love the fact that I can stream any movie or video to my TV while still using my cell phone for anything else. I have seen reviews regarding issues with videos streaming but I can tell it has nothing to do with the Chromecast. The movie loading time is almost right away. So my suggestion is to verify your internet speed and cell phone settings etc. My internet is FiOptic therefore the speed is constantly throughout the day, if you happen to have internet with a regular cable company for instance then your internet speed will fluctuate as you are sharing a hub with your neighbors. In summary this is a great product and the only complain I have read are not related to the product. By the way I am a Samsung user but if you have a google phone then you can play all your apps on your TV.
